description technical detail:
ViewSonics CDP4635-T Full HD touch commercial display
ViewSonics CDP4635-T Full HD touch commercial display features a 1920 x 1080p panel with a 4000:1 contrast ratio and Intels Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) for applications requiring an integrated media player. Additional features include versatile inputs - HDMI, DVI, VGA, S-Video and composite, YPbPr and built-in 10 W x 2 speakers. The CDP4635-T will support up to a 5x5 display video wall with internal clock and scheduler. RS-232 daisy chain capable and RJ45 are provided for remote control.
